title: Mathmatical vs Hivlik

replies.body: I believe Jg (Math) was #1 in soup on badlion at some point in the past might have been another server thought not 100% sure but I think it was badlion :P
replies.body_tagged: I believe Jg (Math) was #1 in soup on badlion at some point in the past might have been another server thought not 100% sure but I think it was badlion :P

replies.body:
rip

I was too confident which led to me being too passive xd
all cuz I had a fight with him right before he started recording
I won with 9 soups!!!
https://www.badlion.net/match/arenapvp/1v1/1996773

but ye he did way better than 95% of the other people in soup ladder xD
im still first place in North America though somehow which is cool i guess :p
